<div align="center">
    <h2>Time Computer 時間計算機</h2>
</div>

<img width="983" alt="image" src="https://github.com/MeganxLi/time-computer/assets/87239200/190e8bd4-8104-48cd-b4f7-1b7f0a60cea9">
<p align="center">
計算當日上班總時間，可切換時、分和秒單位，紀錄近 10 筆時間。
</p>
<p align="center">
  <a href="https://meganxli.github.io/time-computer/">
    <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Demo_website-Your?&style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,&logoColor=ffffff&color=282828" />
  </a>
</p>

## Description

### Programming Languages

- JavaScript
- TypeScript
- Vite

### Frontend

- [React.js](https://reactjs.org/)
- [Vite](https://vitejs.dev/)
- [Ant Design](https://ant.design/)
- [EsLint](https://eslint.org/)

## Building

### Install Packages

```
$ npm install
```

### Start Dev Server

```
$ npm run start
```
